channel.title: CVE Feed for Pegasystems -- Pega Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pegasystems -- Pega Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-32090|2024-08-02T15:03:28.943Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega platform clients who are using versions 6.1 through 7.3.1 may be utilizing default credentials

item.title: CVE-2023-32087|2024-08-02T15:03:28.928Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 8.1 to Infinity 23.1.0 are affected by an XSS issue with task creation

item.title: CVE-2023-50166|2024-08-02T22:09:49.813Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform from 8.5.4 to 8.8.3 is affected by an XSS issue with an unauthenticated user and the redirect parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-4843|2024-08-02T07:38:00.850Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 7.1 to 8.8.3 are affected by an HTML Injection issue with a name field utilized in Visual Business Director, however this field can only be modified by an authenticated administrative user.

item.title: CVE-2023-32088|2024-08-02T15:03:28.972Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 8.1 to Infinity 23.1.0 are affected by an XSS issue with ad-hoc case creation

item.title: CVE-2023-32089|2024-08-02T15:03:29.153Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 8.1 to 8.8.2 are affected by an XSS issue with Pin description

item.title: CVE-2023-50165|2024-08-02T22:09:49.699Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 8.2.1 to Infinity 23.1.0 are affected by an Generated PDF issue that could expose file contents.

item.title: CVE-2023-50167|2024-08-02T22:09:49.662Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform from 7.1.7 to 23.1.1 is affected by an XSS issue with editing/rendering user html content.

item.title: CVE-2023-50168|2024-08-02T22:09:49.636Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform from 6.x to 8.8.4 is affected by an XXE issue with PDF Generation.

item.title: CVE-2023-28094|2024-08-02T12:30:24.140Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega platform clients who are using versions 7.4 through 8.8.x and have upgraded from a version prior to 8.x may be utilizing default credentials.

item.title: CVE-2023-50167|2024-06-04T17:17:52.331Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform from 7.1.7 to 23.1.1 is affected by an XSS issue with editing/rendering user html content.
